name: Elephant Dave Demo
description:
Controls:

WASD : Move

LMB : Interact

RMB : Select target for attack

E : Talk to NPC

To Initiate Combat

Head to the barrels on the right of the grandma after finding the can of beans and click using LMB on them.

This is a game that I had made during Grade 12 in high school with a couple of friends as a big class project. We had only 3 months to do this. We had most of the major systems ready but ran out of time before we could put everything together.

Credits:
